channel.title: Revamping DeltaScape [317]
channel.description:
[center] Now I've decided to return and restart my project to now Revamp DeltaScape from its original state from one my my own bases. This time I plan it to be successful into be created to a [b]World 2 to synergy-pkz[/b]. I hope this to be a very adequate project and organized to make sure that the server is both impressive ingame and also the server files itself.
[size=25pt]BASE - MY SOURCE (SYNERGY-PKZ 317) [/size]
Yes I know Delta is hard to work with since it IS a horrible base; although that's why I created this project, so I could try and lighten the server itself.
[size=25pt] PROGRESS |||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||[/size] Our server is run on an Alienware M17x (Custom edition) [/center] [b]Server Information[/b]
[ul][li]AVG 9.0 Platinium Edition[/li] [li]16GB Ram[/li] [li]100MBps Uplink[/li] [li]24/7 connectivity[/li] [li]350GB HDD[/li] [li]cPanel (For coders)[/li] [li]Windows 7 Ultimate 64 bit[/li] [li]24-7 Synced backup to 500GB external HDD[/li] [li]ReadyBoost (Memory Backup)[/li] [li]Quad Core 3.33Ghz (MAXED OUT)[/li][/ul]
[center] Suggestive updates?: -Manual NPC clipping -ZombieSuite 1.0.6 -Server stability improved -317 Party room [color=orange]-New NPC drop formula[/color] [color=green]-Sounds and teleport methods revamped - COMPLETED![/color] -Item prices modified -100% to each and every skill -Custom interfaces to create the user-friendly gameplay -Sounds and teleport methods revamped -All glitches fixed -New quests -100% Similarities to RuneScape minigames -Model preloading -Skill guides (Skill tab) - COMPLETED! -Multi-barrage - COMPLETED! -Hovering on the client - COMPLETED! -New animations/custom animations -Bosses -Variety of towns -Little semantics (NPC dialogue on men, NPC drops to every npc, doors, etc.) -Duel arena -Pest Control - COMPLETED!
More will DEFINITELY come soon.
[size=25pt]Client Pictures[/size]
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/fciex1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2eqe22s.png[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/122dbu0.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/1t7qm8.gif[/img]
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/10e4ktj.gif[/img]

[b][size=25pt]Updates[/size]
UPDATES: 1-22-09 -Finished up how to use ZombieSuite -Finished Pest Control -Changed the Directory of the character files
UPDATES: 1/23/09 -Added JRebel -Fixed Pest Control to resemble RuneScape more. -Fixed Client sprites -Enforced total solitary confinement in the jail -Removed the three follow glitch to get out of jail -Disabled following in jail
UPDATES: 1/23/09 -Edited NPC vs NPC -Created a new interface -Made a new minigame "Hunter survival"
UPDATES 1/24/09 -Finished multi-barrage -Used java.util.timer to fix entangleDelay -Polished the server stability a bit. -Finished all skill guides (On skill tab)
UPDATES: 1/25/10 -Finished 60% of ladders (Most ladders are similar) -Expanded to a Dialogue handler -Added in a 'skills' folder into the server [/b]
Server coders -Kingdomkey01 -Superaust - -
Client Coders -Kingdomkey01 -Superaust -
Beta Testers -New Clear -Mistaken -Ashley - -
Moderators -Randall -Max -
Town designers -Superaust - -
Website coders -Mistaken - -
Oh, one thing that seems different is the "Town designers". Basically those players have complete control prior to designing the towns. Basically they know where each NPC will go, where they will be placed, how and where the objects are going to be placed. I believe this has a somewhat little burden off the server coders back.
Application -- [code] CONTACT FOR MESSENGER:
AGE (optional):
EXPERIENCES:
POSITION APPLYING FOR:
OTHER: [/code]Now my contact(s) are this --
AIM: ultimaweapon9999 YIM: [EMAIL="pendragon283@yahoo.com"]pendragon283@yahoo.com[/EMAIL] MY SISTERS MSN: [EMAIL="xxgirlyfagxx@live.com"]xxgirlyfagxx@live.com[/EMAIL] EMAIL: [EMAIL="pendragon283@yahoo.com"]pendragon283@yahoo.com[/EMAIL] [/center]

item.title: Revamping DeltaScape [317]
item.dc:creator: @Souls2 Souls`
item.description:
@Souls2 wrote:

[quote=“kingdomkey01, post:27, topic:327152”]Errm, construction may not be that hard to create… I could use a concept like for the fight caves (seperate map) and plus the objects are already in the 377 cache (I’ve checked before). When your inside building mode you can set a sidebar interface as a building guide, UI

Plus I just wanted to revamp the base I should’ve been more specific in my topic :p.

Your applications have been taken under review.

UPDATES: 2-17-10
-Successfully packaged server (Devo style)
-Seperating skills into classes
-Finished an optional tut island (Users can choose whether or not they want to go to the mainland or take the tutorial for an extra prize.)

I’m on my phone I’ll post pics tomorrow.[/quote]

Firstly, Construction is one of the hardest skills to create. Even if you do, you will need to fix the nulls and bugs with it. Really hard to make.

Read full topic

item.title: Revamping DeltaScape [317]
item.dc:creator: @kingdomkey01 kingdomkey01
item.description:
@kingdomkey01 wrote:

Errm, construction may not be that hard to create… I could use a concept like for the fight caves (seperate map) and plus the objects are already in the 377 cache (I’ve checked before). When your inside building mode you can set a sidebar interface as a building guide, UI.

Plus I just wanted to revamp the base I should’ve been more specific in my topic :p.

Your applications have been taken under review.

UPDATES: 2-17-10
-Successfully packaged server (Devo style)
-Seperating skills into classes
-Finished an optional tut island (Users can choose whether or not they want to go to the mainland or take the tutorial for an extra prize.)

I’m on my phone I’ll post pics tomorrow.

Read full topic

item.title: Revamping DeltaScape [317]
item.dc:creator: @Amayzing Amayzing
item.description:
@Amayzing wrote:

CONTACT FOR MESSENGER: Alex.232323@live.com (I’m not sure why you put your sisters’ MSN but I added it to get in touch with you since I’m almost always on MSN)

AGE (optional): I’m fifteen years old.

EXPERIENCES: I’ve had staff experience on various large servers such as Runekeep.com (180,000 registered members, I’m still the lead global moderator), Rs3.suba-studios.com (Closed but had over 7,000 registered members). I have several other counts of experience, let me know if you’d like me to list them. I’ve also had lots of web design experience that includes both website management like Joomla or Drupal and forum management; I have a current website running with IPB 2.3.6.

POSITION APPLYING FOR: Website management/designer (I mostly develop forums but I wouldn’t mind creating a nice home page as well).

OTHER: I hope you accept me.

Read full topic

item.title: Revamping DeltaScape [317]
item.dc:creator: @kingdomkey01 kingdomkey01
item.description:
@kingdomkey01 wrote:

Well it’s not actually an auto map method. I have to custom add it coordinate by coordinate. (I know not the easiest way) although Delta is annoying to work with.

I edited my NPC walking method and also interpreted the getMove void and created two handlers in relation. One to set the coordinates, one to clip the coordinate, and edited the method in which the NPC follows in combat so that it’ll clip.

Read full topic
